column3: Yes, thanks for the fix, but please file his to the trivial branch, it doesn't get more trivial than this :)\n
OK, done.\nPull request #50, in theuni/bitcoin branch trivial-next.\n

@laanwj I understand the reason to use @theuni's trivial repository is to decrease noise here.  But,  how much noise will it reduce really versus just a merge here?\nOr is it purely _merge_ noise that we looking to resolve with trivial?\n
@dcousens it's about pull request noise, about delegation. Reducing merge noise (by grouping related commits) is a nice side effect. \n
Closing the pull here, thanks for moving it.\n
